items.title: Goldman Sachs combines three Asia IB businesses, names Drayton new unit head
items.description: HONG KONG -Goldman Sachs is merging three Asian investment banking businesses it previously managed separately into a single unit to integrate its regional deals advisory and capital market...

items.title: Goldman Sachs combines Asia investment banking units, names Drayton APAC head
items.description: HONG KONG -Goldman Sachs is bringing together previously separately-managed three Asian investment banking businesses into one unit to integrate its regional deals advice and capital market...

items.title: Goldman Sachs Stays Strong Amid Market Turbulence, But Still Sensitive
items.description: Goldman Sachs remains a leader in M&A and trading, with strong Q1 2025 results despite a challenging market environment. Read why I rate GS stock as a Hold.
